text.config.adnc-configs.option.useTimeL: Use the built-in java time library, which will make the sun's position less precise.
text.config.adnc-configs.option.maxmindD: This the link to the maxmind db link that's used to determine your ip. THIS TECHNICALLY VIOLATES MAXMIND'S TOS AS I'M DOWNLOADING IT FROM GITHUB AND NOT THE OFFICIAL WEBSITE
text.config.adnc-configs.option.gmtTimeZ: The GMT timezone of where you are, ex: +05:00
